## Checklist

<!-- Please complete these items before requesting review -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards
- [ ] I have run `npm test` and all checks pass
- [ ] I have run `npm run test:php` and all checks pass (if PHP changes)
- [ ] No god classes were increased in size (files >1,000 lines)
- [ ] No new god classes were created

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix/feature works
- [ ] All new and existing tests pass
- [ ] Test coverage has not decreased

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have added i18n messages for any new user-facing strings
- [ ] I have updated CHANGELOG.md (for significant changes)
